page.title: 07 GOING HOME BY TRAIN
page.content:
From Maidstone East to Borough Green the whole{railway journey}takes about 20 minutes and it takes about 5 minutes to get to Barming. The train is divided up into first-class compartments at the front of the train and the second class at the rear - these are split up into smoking and non-smoking. The journey really begins after passing over the River Medway. You pass the Maidstone Industrial Centre and later on you pass the path leading to St.Simon Stock School. You can also see houses and fields with cattle and horses in.
by John Dent
